website_summaries.verdict: A metal feeder that's easy to set up and easily attracts deer and turkeys.
pros: Metal bucket holds up to abuse from animals
Can feed at dawn and dusk
Will automatically feed based on lighting changes
Camouflage finish helps hide it from animals
cons: Does not have as many feed times

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hang. I use a ratchet strap between two trees. Will hold almost all of a 50 lb bag of soy beans. I used screws with nuts and lock washer instead of what comes with it. I set the timer for about 5 seconds and it lasts for two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Don't work very well. Filled with whole kernel corn, everything binds up and won't spread the corn. If I touch it , then it spins, tried another new battery, same thing. Never had that trouble with my other feeders. That's maybe why it was cheap
customer_reviews.author: Big dog

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Says it takes a 6 volt battery but it will not work without a 12 volt battery and a 12 volt battery will not fit in the case. I went to Lowe’s and bought a 15 foot septic PVC pipe and a PVC cap and it cost me $10. I cut it in half and strapped it to a tree and had 2 cheap corn feeders that work good
customer_reviews.author: alex wetherington

customer_reviews.title: Need to build a stand so it won't spin as it sprays the corn out like a machine gunner in a helicopter
customer_reviews.text: This thing can sling some corn! 40lbs lasts about two weeks. Need to build a stand so it won't spin as it sprays the corn out like a machine gunner in a helicopter. Deer, turkey, bear, squirrels, raccoons, and crows it does not seem to bother.
customer_reviews.author: Derek A. Weddle

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought one just to try it( was skeptical of the low price) but it works as described. Photo cell is reliable and motor is very strong. Caution throws corn violently towards your head if in range! Seriously. Just bought my second one yesterday. Note: if it matters to anyone, coat the bottom of the bucket rim and motor blade in silicone to quite the unit during operation. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: OnlyGetsWilder

customer_reviews.title: Good product, questionable durability
customer_reviews.text: The feeder arrived damaged, and I would have returned but it was for my father in law’s birthday and there wasn’t enough time to get another one. The Amazon box was in perfect condition, the product and packaging was damaged leading me to believe that they were already damaged when placed in the box to be shipped. Someone should have caught that. The feeder itself, other than being dented, was everything I expected and easy to assemble. I am deducting stars because it must have been fairly easily damaged to arrive that way.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and easy to use and program
customer_reviews.text: Run when you hit the test button or you are going to get hurt. Easy to install and easy to use and program.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Hardison

customer_reviews.title: Turned out it will only work with a rechargeable batery
customer_reviews.text: Purchased, assembled, installed in a tree then tested. After buying a 6 volt batery for $10 customer support for the company told me rudely that It would only work with a rechargeable batery. It doesnt say that anywhere on the add or in the packaging so count on spending another $20 for a batery and $20 for a charger. This thing is stupid.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Barkley Norton

customer_reviews.title: Will never purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Worst feeder I've ever owned and I've owned a lot of them The only time it works is when you hit test mode. On 3 occasions when it did work it only ran for 2 or 3 seconds. Battery is at full power but unit keeps failing.
customer_reviews.author: Tom from Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Does what its supposed to. And has survived 2 bear attacks
customer_reviews.text: Works great, auto timer is reliable. Be careful testing it really throws feed far. I can go 2 weeks after filling it with corn. Ive had 2 bears tear it down at different times and it may be a bit bent up and chewed on. But still keeps going. Definitely hang by rope high and away from trees. I strung mine up by branches of 2 trees and that stopped the bears. I had a camera on mine and got very many awesome pics
customer_reviews.author: robi

customer_reviews.title: Works for mobile feeder
customer_reviews.text: Good feeder and works as advised. Only change I'd make is add some kind of marker to identify duration the feeder will spin the corn.
customer_reviews.author: R C

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This things works GREAT! I've had it for about a year now. I added a small solar charger and rechargeable battery and it works like a clock. Great value and product.
customer_reviews.author: David Dirrim

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought in March 2018. The picture is from October 2018. The lid rusted through, and the motor stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: tcwOleMiss

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Only problem squirrels ate the plastic funnel to get to the corn fixed it with a thin piece of sheet metal ND never had another problem but we still have a lot of fat and happy squirrels
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together works great. Large dent in metal side of bucket popped mostly back out. Figured wouldn’t matter lol.
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only downfall for me is I would like to be able to program the two different feed times myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good deer feeder
customer_reviews.text: Took about 10 minutes to put together and get running. The lid stays on fine for me. Like the other postings, it really shoots out the corn! Works well.
customer_reviews.author: MikeLikeBeer

customer_reviews.title: It works and does the job
customer_reviews.text: It is an inexpensive deer feeder that works. I check it often and it is fine for my use. My son has several feeders including this one in Louisiana. He likes it too.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Ok but wont buy again
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this one star bbecause the feeder motor went out after 3 days of use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price this feeder works great. Timer works
customer_reviews.text: For the price this feeder works great. Timer works, kind of a pain drilling the 2inch hole but other than that I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.author: msk

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong with this feeder
customer_reviews.text: I never expected this to be this great for such a inexpensive price. It’s easy to use and cost half of what my friends spent.
customer_reviews.author: Earl

customer_reviews.title: Great product,at a good price
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. I feed deer corn,after set up ,you can almost check your watch, to se when it starts feeding
customer_reviews.author: DANNY BARB

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to assemble and does take some tools. Only feeds twice a day and you can not set the time it feeds. It feeds an hour after daylight (approx) and an hour before sunset (approx). Other than that it is an excellent item. Feeds great and works great. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Snuffer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Only works in test mode either bad board or bad optic eye unit does not work
customer_reviews.author: Derek Deere

customer_reviews.title: Photocell timers are outdated shouldn’t be made anymore
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working, put new battery and pressed test and didn’t work. Guess the motor burnt out didn’t even last 3 months and was starting to get wildlife coming in. I liked the can and all but gonna have to get a new timer all together and take the photocell one out.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime a Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small and easy to work. Throws corn a long way. Also nicely camouflaged
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As Described
customer_reviews.text: Minor assembly required. Worked right out of the box. ( when you use the right 6v battery). Seem down the sides is bare metal so will need to paint to avoid rusting. Will update when I monter working in the field.
customer_reviews.author: William Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Goog product and goog value
customer_reviews.text: I have several large barrel feeders. They take a little more engineering to get them in the tree. This bucket feeder is easy to assemble go value for the price. You can take it out off the box and have it hanging on a branch quick. I also like the simplicity of the timer it is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: S. Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Handles  do not appear like they are going to last
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't put out enough corn even on high setting, no good if it's a wet or muddy area
customer_reviews.author: lsara

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Damaged in shipping I was going to try and use it but after I got everything put together the lid don't fit
customer_reviews.author: troy

customer_reviews.title: Bring the deer to you.
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple and it works great. Photocell works well. Sprays the corn far too.
customer_reviews.author: GUY FOX

customer_reviews.title: good feeder but didn’t like the automatic photo sensor prefer setting my own time
customer_reviews.text: i didn’t like that it was a photo timed feeder i prefer to set my own times for the feeder to run
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: The feeder i received is just as described. The ...
customer_reviews.text: The feeder i received is just as described. The issue see is that the bracket that attaches the feeder to the bucket is cheap plastic, and will most likely not last too long.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. About 2 weeks worth of food for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. About 2 weeks worth of food for the deer. That is about as often as I can fill it up.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: This product has plastic battery housing and plastic housing brackets that mount to the bottom of the bucket, not metal ones as shown in the photo in the description. Sent them back! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: DPJ

customer_reviews.title: inspect all parts
customer_reviews.text: works great, had to unbend lid and barrel so lid would somewhat fit. handle was another story, it was bent beyond fix so I modified it to work, would have sent back but had to get feeder back in woods for hogs. old feeder was destroyed by bear so this one will probably be next.
customer_reviews.author: MARK

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Throws feed out 2 times a day. No issues for the month I have had it hanging in the back yard
customer_reviews.author: jbrummett

customer_reviews.title: Something causing fuse to keep blowing
customer_reviews.text: It’s not good at all I have changed the fuse 4 times it keep blowing fuses ! There is a defect going on with it and I didn’t buy this to keep buying fuses changing them. Also it messing my hunting up because it of dependable fuse keep blowing
customer_reviews.author: James Cox

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 2 years and that's putting it up thru the summer
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a Christmas gift so far so good
customer_reviews.author: DONALD JORDAN,SR.

customer_reviews.title: This thing launches the corn out fast and far offering a great radius.
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple feeder that definitely gets the corn out. When you get ready to test it make sure to duck. This thing launches the corn out fast and far offering a great radius.
customer_reviews.author: JPD5687

customer_reviews.title: Use correct battery
customer_reviews.text: Super easy. Need a drill bit that’s it. Deer hit it w heads so sturdy. Also use the dense batter not the 6 volt w the springs
customer_reviews.author: ColonelSan

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the money but...
customer_reviews.text: If they know you’re going to hang it then why not put use something other than a regular bucket handle. The lid could be made easier to get on and off too
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: It ok.
customer_reviews.text: Missing 2 pieces. Wild Game Innovations couldn’t send replacements. Amazon sent a replacement which works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mister S

customer_reviews.title: i am a avvid hunter these are the best feeders going
customer_reviews.text: i am a avvid hunter these are the best feeders going, i am also the manager of a hunting camp i am trying to get everyone to use these feeders
customer_reviews.author: Fred Massoni

customer_reviews.title: ... am gone for several day's at a time works great
customer_reviews.text: I already had one on the back corner of property to feed the pheasant and qual this one was bought to feed my chickens when i am gone for several day's at a time works great
customer_reviews.author: Tony Railsback

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Heavy when full make sure you have something to hold it
customer_reviews.author: daryl mackie sr

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: My husband like the first one and requested a second one
customer_reviews.author: Debra Puhalla

customer_reviews.title: New but not improved
customer_reviews.text: Works great but not as sturdy as the all metal ones but gets the job done at a low price
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work at all
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend for Christmas and he’s just now getting around to setting it up. It doesn’t work at all. Not even a little bit. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Kyker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and works great. I would like to see a self centering lip on the funnel though it would make it so much easier and more precise.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I have 3 of them now and they all work great!
customer_reviews.author: Ken McClellan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: lets in a little moisture, but does keep the squirels and racoons out.
customer_reviews.author: Charles S.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Container is a 5 gallon steel pail. Bought and installed rechargeable battery and works just as advertised. Bought another.
customer_reviews.author: Ed S

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Feeder is attached with plastic supports. Test button didn’t work. One step above 5 gallon bucket and a broom stick.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: it works for the money. Camo fades to seafoam colors in sunlight.
customer_reviews.text: The feeder worked as expected. I used a black rubber bungie cord on the handle to hold it up on a tree limb and that worked great. My feeder was in direct sunlight. The paint faded in the few short months it was out to a lovely seafoam colored camo. I will be buying a plastic grey bucket and putting the feeder unit onto the bottom of that. I suspect that will make it "camo" much longer and better as well as secure the lid better. I use feed corn in mine and it works like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: samuel m hennessee

customer_reviews.title: Can’t program timer
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed in the timer, you can’t set your feed times, it somehow senses the time of day and activates the spreader twice a day
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: Received in great shape. And works well. Well made construction very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: brian l ashcraft

customer_reviews.title: great mobile feeding unit....feeds twice daily, no timer - just add battery
customer_reviews.text: met all my expectations and easy to use in the field. don't forget the battery!
customer_reviews.author: MZF

customer_reviews.title: Feeder works well overall. The corn shoots out to ...
customer_reviews.text: Feeder works well overall. The corn shoots out to hard, if you are not careful you can be hit even at 30 yards away.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Witham

customer_reviews.title: I made sturdy legs from 2x4
customer_reviews.text: Works advertised. The spreader is mounted to the pail on flimsy plastic legs. Mine broke while assembling. I made sturdy legs from 2x4. Much sturdier. To be fair, I am rough on things. Would defiantly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Works great. I use it on my dock as a fish feeder.
customer_reviews.author: jimstar

customer_reviews.title: Don’t forget to buy a battery!
customer_reviews.text: It works well. Wish you could set the actual time and when it goes off. I’ve already shot multiple wild boars using this feeder so it definitely works!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Klepek

customer_reviews.title: Price is right
customer_reviews.text: We have used these feeders in the past and they work great for us
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Kirchgessner

customer_reviews.title: Corn launcher
customer_reviews.text: Used for whole corn works well. Does not come with 6v battery or charger so make Sure you also order them.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany  Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Outer box great, box for feed looked great open it up missing parts and buckets unusable..... so sad to see this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great feeder!!!
customer_reviews.text: The bucket was great, sturdy, easy to assemble and easy to use. Definitely buying another one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: sucker my deer. make it easy to pattern. once addicted to corn they lose.
customer_reviews.author: jay brogdon

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for about 2 months then just stopped throwing ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for about 2 months then just stopped throwing corn...out a new battery in and still doesn’t work push the test button and it works fine
customer_reviews.author: Shannon stone

customer_reviews.title: Great feeder
customer_reviews.text: Been using this a while now great feeder, a little noisy when it goes off due to the aluminum feeding plate. it feeds twice a day once In morning and once In the evening. Every 6 days it needs filled considering your feeding speeds 10 sec or 15 sec you set to spit corn out.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great feeder for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good feeder, dill it up and will last two weeks. Lots of deer coming in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work ok once you put a bunch of work into ...
customer_reviews.text: Work ok once you put a bunch of work into building them. My biggest complaints is the 1 hour after dark feeding time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expected better
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2, both were dented, and instruction show a bracket to attach the automated feeder to the bucket, yet it doesn't come with one.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Nabih

customer_reviews.title: So far this one has worked good. Have 2 from last year like this one ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this one has worked good. Have 2 from last year like this one that I have a difficult time adjusting feeding time. They're either 2 seconds or 15-20 seconds with no in-between. God is Great!
customer_reviews.author: William Butler

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Other than the lid is hard to keep closed, this is a very good feeder!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald B.

customer_reviews.title: It will scare the deer away for awhile until they get used to it.
customer_reviews.text: Needs painted, rusts instantly. Needs a spot in the handle to keep rope from sliding. The sensor for the light works great. The motor flings corn extremely far and fast, it leaves a cloud of corn dust. It will scare the deer away for awhile. The lid leaves a little to be desired also. Overall a decent buy
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: and they're exactly what I wanted and worked fine. The price was good too
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these, and they're exactly what I wanted and worked fine. The price was good too.
customer_reviews.author: Joe in Alabama

customer_reviews.title: Only came with one bracket
customer_reviews.text: Can't mount the feeder assembly onto the bucket with just one mounting bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Brings in the deer
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put up and begin using and it brought a nice 10 pointer in!
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Be careful when you test it. It throws corn with some velocity and distance.
customer_reviews.author: George S.

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: They have sent me 3 now and all them were missing the bottom funnel and screws to assemble. it is a little ridiculous that no one can figure out that this product does not have the parts needed to assemble according to the Manufacture's assembling instruction and parts list on the manual. i have included a picture of the assembly manual and parts list, with missing parts circled in Red
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Lid won't even stay on not impressed at all really
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Perdue

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely does not hold 50 pounds of corn but does it’s job well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great feeder, held up to multiple hits from a few black bears.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Assembly Required! Including drilling holes. Crappie design, bottom is flat will not funnel the feed.
customer_reviews.author: Curious-MIke

customer_reviews.title: Received similar but different feeder.
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the "Metal Monsta" version of this feeder as described & pictured. The timer/spinner housing are all plastic and the distance from the come to spinner is not adjustable. Attached image of the feeder I received, not nearly as sturdy as the metal monsta.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: DISAPPOINTING I bought this deer feeder expecting this to work great. I put corn in there 2 days ago expecting it last a bit. Last night there were tons of deer around eating corn and some other things i had out. I was surprised that there were over 20 deer and ive only had it a little while. I went back to check today and there was no corn. The deer can get to the corn because of the funnel and it was a complete waist of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Daene Boomsma

customer_reviews.title: Big bang for the buck! It holds just about ...
customer_reviews.text: Big bang for the buck! It holds just about a bag of corn and will run for at least a month on a quality or rechargable battery. It goes off reliably at dusk or dawn or there about. If you are looking for a cheap relaible feder this works well. Biggest draw back is limited capacity, 40 to 50 pounds. At the right setting it will last two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Cassano

customer_reviews.title: We love having a timed delivery for the animals
customer_reviews.text: We love having a timed delivery for the animals. Only problem is it really sprays, 10 to 15 yards. The spray does allow more animals to enjoy the corn at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Harless

customer_reviews.title: Nice small feeder
customer_reviews.text: Has about a 20ft pattern with whole corn kernels. Works well. It's a steel bucket and lid. Minor assembly just just have to have a drill, no big deal
customer_reviews.author: tim russell

customer_reviews.title: Good feeder for the money
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised but is very noisy when it flings the corn. Otherwise works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Three days out the automation device that times the run ...
customer_reviews.text: Three days out the automation device that times the run time runs continuously.How can I get a replacement? Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Larry R Loveless

customer_reviews.title: I thought this had a timer on it where I ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this had a timer on it where I could set the exact time I wanted. Maybe I didn't read it clearly. It has a photoeye on it. feeds once in morning and once at night. I didn't want it to feed during the night. otherwise works very well.
customer_reviews.author: adam lohr

customer_reviews.title: my problem is it sounds like the fourth of July going off and throws corn ...
customer_reviews.text: The bucket is ok, my problem is it sounds like the fourth of July going off and throws corn everywhere. You may like that, I personally did not see many deer, with few little bucks on my camera near this pail, everywhere else on our farm we were picking up more deer and bigger bucks. I think it scared them, it works as advertised, I would simply say get a better barrel and feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Barefoot

customer_reviews.title: ... now he can move it wherever he wants it easily.
customer_reviews.text: my grandson loves this now he can move it wherever he wants it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Jones

customer_reviews.title: Lighter construction than normal. Side walls on bucket are ...
customer_reviews.text: Lighter construction than normal. Side walls on bucket are thin. Helps on weight, but if dropped to ground the bucket bends up and you need to straighten it out to get it to seal.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

product_meta.title: Wildgame Innovations Pail Feeder, Real Tree Camo Steel, 50-Lbs.
product_meta.description: The Quick Set 50 features a 30 ft./360 degree range. It comes with a durable 6.5 gallon/50 lb. hanging pail and plastic photocell control unit. With dawn and dusk available feed times, galvanized spinner plate and 6V battery operation, battery not included.
feature_bullets: Dawn and dusk available feed times
Dawn and dusk available feed times

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
